name: cangjie
title: Cangjie Dictionary
description: Fast Chinese characters lookup for Cangjie and Sucheng codes. Supports instant search from selected text and provides both English letters and Chinese radicals.
author: jimmyclchu

commands.name: cangjie
commands.title: Search Cangjie Codes
commands.subtitle: Cangjie Dictionary
commands.description: Look up Cangjie codes for Chinese characters.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
